plot: Telemafia is what happens when a telemarketer picks the wrong consumer to call. The two "cross phones" in a conversational duel in what starts out as a typical telemarketing cold call and ends up being a call that neither will ever forget.
title: Telemafia
plot_es: Telemafia is what happens when a telemarketer picks the wrong consumer to call. The two "cross phones" in a conversational duel in what starts out as a typical telemarketing cold call and ends up being a call that neither will ever forget.
